name: On Undermining.
description:
A sequel to a narrative-based metroidvania about pranks. Made for  the "Sidequesters Sequel Jam" (me and a few gamedev buddies :))

If you have not already, please play Andrfw's On Being Undermined., which this game is based on. It's one of my favorite short games ever,   and    may just be the best 30 minutes of your day!
